title: I Shop for a Living, and These Are the 15 Pretty Nordstrom Fashion and Beauty Finds in My Cart RN
description: Lace-trim skirts, shimmery eye shadows, and more.
author: Josephine Hadjiloucas
excerpt: Lace-trim skirts, shimmery eye shadows, and more.
text: "What do you do for a living?" Oh, me? I shop. But the question I’m hoping follows is "Where have you been shopping lately?" Because trust, I'm always ready to yap about what’s in my Nordstrom cart. It’s my favorite kind of small talk. It's only natural for a shopping editor to want to share her fashion and beauty picks with others. Share the wealth, right? Not to mention it's my job to keep you up to date on all things Nordstrom. And with the Nordstrom Anniversary Sale less than two weeks away, starting July 12, I've been sleeping, breathing, and dreaming Nordstrom.Back to these gorgeous Nordstrom picks—I'm talking fashion finds so unimaginably cool, my new title should be style archaeologist. From pretty lace-trim skirts, which are totally in right now, to the Adidas Tokyo Low Top sneakers I've spotted everywhere on the streets of NYC and the cutest jelly kitten heels from Steve Madden.Next, can we give it up for these beauty finds? Products so good I’m considering returning to my MUA days. It'd be wrong to gatekeep this kind of glam: a Jo Malone cologne I desperately need to restock because I wear it every single day, a shimmery liquid eye shadow from Armani Beauty I've been longing to try, and an extreme volumizing mascara from Dior that's sure to bat an eye, plus so many other goodies.Ahead, 15 Nordstrom fashion and beauty finds that are taking up space in my shopping cart right now. I've also added some more top Nordstrom picks, and trust me, they'll be added to your cart in no time. Nordstrom Lace Trim Bias Cut Midi Skirt Reformation Julie Knit Tank If you know me, you know I love a boatneck. Jo Malone London Wood Sage & Sea Salt Cologne This is my go-to birthday, holiday, or just-because gift. I've never gotten any complaints. adidas Tokyo Low Top Suede Sneaker Take a page out of the NYC fashion playbook, and grab a pair of these Samba-who? trainers. Open Edit Linen Blend Vest A great set to take you from the weekday into the weekend. Open Edit Everyday Pleated Linen Blend Shorts The matching shorts. And to be honest, these are just as cute on their own. ARMANI beauty Eye Tint Longwear Liquid Eyeshadow Open Edit Tori Kitten Heel Sandal Nineties influence is here to stick around. DIOR Diorshow Overvolume Extreme Volume Mascara If you need volume, this is your new go-to. Levi's Ribcage High Waist Wide Leg Jeans ARMANI beauty Prisma Glass High Shine Lip Gloss Steve Madden Tracie Kitten Heel Flip Flop Jelly kitten heels are so cute. Plus, they come in so many colors. Open Edit Cotton Poplin Maxi Skirt MIA Harbor Slingback Sandal Reminds of a designer shoe. Sign me up! Suede is woody and aromatic with notes of pear, bergamot, and fresh aldehydes. Shop More Fashion Finds Jeffrey Campbell Lollipop Kitten Heel Sandal WAYF Nina Smock Waist Seersucker Midi Dress XERO SHOES Genesis Rope Style Barefoot Sandal Spotted these in the Athens airport. Open Edit Everyday Linen Blend Pants Open Edit Luxe Sculpt Rib Tank MANGO Fringe Slingback Pump Shop More Beauty Finds CHANEL Inimitable Waterproof Mascara Volume - Length - Curl - Separation DIOR Addict Lip Glow Balm One of my favorite lip balms. I use it every day. Kiehl's Since 1851 Ultra Facial Cream Kiehl's products make me happy. HENRY ROSE Windows Down P.C.H. Eau de Parfum Notes of grapefruit, bergamot, Earl Grey tea, and a neroli. So fresh. CHANEL Stylo Yeux Waterproof Long-Lasting Eyeliner CHANEL Le Rouge Duo Ultra Tenue Ultra Wear Lip Colour Lancôme Lash Idôle Volumizing Mascara I love a volumizing mascara.
html:
"What do you do for a living?" Oh, me? I shop. But the question I’m hoping follows is "Where have you been shopping lately?" Because trust, I'm always ready to yap about what’s in my Nordstrom cart. It’s my favorite kind of small talk. It's only natural for a shopping editor to want to share her fashion and beauty picks with others. Share the wealth, right? Not to mention it's my job to keep you up to date on all things Nordstrom. And with the Nordstrom Anniversary Sale less than two weeks away, starting July 12, I've been sleeping, breathing, and dreaming Nordstrom.

Back to these gorgeous Nordstrom picks—I'm talking fashion finds so unimaginably cool, my new title should be style archaeologist. From pretty lace-trim skirts, which are totally in right now, to the Adidas Tokyo Low Top sneakers I've spotted everywhere on the streets of NYC and the cutest jelly kitten heels from Steve Madden.

Next, can we give it up for these beauty finds? Products so good I’m considering returning to my MUA days. It'd be wrong to gatekeep this kind of glam: a Jo Malone cologne I desperately need to restock because I wear it every single day, a shimmery liquid eye shadow from Armani Beauty I've been longing to try, and an extreme volumizing mascara from Dior that's sure to bat an eye, plus so many other goodies.

Ahead, 15 Nordstrom fashion and beauty finds that are taking up space in my shopping cart right now. I've also added some more top Nordstrom picks, and trust me, they'll be added to your cart in no time.

Nordstrom

Lace Trim Bias Cut Midi Skirt

Reformation

Julie Knit Tank

If you know me, you know I love a boatneck.

Jo Malone London

Wood Sage & Sea Salt Cologne

This is my go-to birthday, holiday, or just-because gift. I've never gotten any complaints.

adidas

Tokyo Low Top Suede Sneaker

Take a page out of the NYC fashion playbook, and grab a pair of these Samba-who? trainers.

Open Edit

Linen Blend Vest

A great set to take you from the weekday into the weekend.

Open Edit

Everyday Pleated Linen Blend Shorts

The matching shorts. And to be honest, these are just as cute on their own.

ARMANI beauty

Eye Tint Longwear Liquid Eyeshadow

Open Edit

Tori Kitten Heel Sandal

Nineties influence is here to stick around.

DIOR

Diorshow Overvolume Extreme Volume Mascara

If you need volume, this is your new go-to.

Levi's

Ribcage High Waist Wide Leg Jeans

ARMANI beauty

Prisma Glass High Shine Lip Gloss

Steve Madden

Tracie Kitten Heel Flip Flop

Jelly kitten heels are so cute. Plus, they come in so many colors.

Open Edit

Cotton Poplin Maxi Skirt

MIA

Harbor Slingback Sandal

Reminds of a designer shoe. Sign me up!

Suede is woody and aromatic with notes of pear, bergamot, and fresh aldehydes.

Shop More Fashion Finds

Jeffrey Campbell

Lollipop Kitten Heel Sandal

WAYF

Nina Smock Waist Seersucker Midi Dress

XERO SHOES

Genesis Rope Style Barefoot Sandal

Spotted these in the Athens airport.

Open Edit

Open Edit

Luxe Sculpt Rib Tank

Shop More Beauty Finds

CHANEL

Inimitable Waterproof Mascara Volume - Length - Curl - Separation

DIOR

Addict Lip Glow Balm

One of my favorite lip balms. I use it every day.

Kiehl's Since 1851

Ultra Facial Cream

Kiehl's products make me happy.

HENRY ROSE

Windows Down P.C.H. Eau de Parfum

Notes of grapefruit, bergamot, Earl Grey tea, and a neroli. So fresh.

CHANEL

Stylo Yeux Waterproof Long-Lasting Eyeliner

CHANEL

Le Rouge Duo Ultra Tenue Ultra Wear Lip Colour

Lancôme

Lash Idôle Volumizing Mascara

I love a volumizing mascara.
